cats.name: Ginger Cat
cats.description: A cheerful, living cat that has definitively chosen a state of existence. Unlocked by observing an 'alive' outcome.
cats.strength: Unwavering optimism. Can find a sunbeam in any room.
cats.weakness: Easily distracted by laser pointers and benevolent hands.

cats.name: Ghost Cat
cats.description: A spectral cat, a remnant of a quantum state that has collapsed into non-existence. Unlocked by observing a 'dead' outcome.
cats.strength: Can pass through closed doors to find the best napping spots.
cats.weakness: Slightly translucent, making it hard to show up in photos.

cats.name: Shadow Cat
cats.description: A mysterious, dark-furred cat that seems to absorb the light around it. Unlocked by observing an 'alive' outcome.
cats.strength: Master of stealth. Has never once been heard approaching.
cats.weakness: Tends to blend in with dark rugs, leading to accidental trips.

cats.name: Bones Cat
cats.description: An articulated skeleton of a cat, rattling with quantum uncertainty. Unlocked by observing a 'dead' outcome.
cats.strength: Never needs to eat. Immune to the allure of the food bowl.
cats.weakness: A bit noisy on hardwood floors. Cannot purr.

cats.name: Identity Crisis Cat
cats.description: This cat is... having a moment. It seems to be borrowing parts from other cats. Unlocked by observing an 'alive' outcome.
cats.strength: A Jack of all trades; possesses a patchwork of feline abilities.
cats.weakness: Occasionally forgets which parts belong to it. Mildly confused.

cats.name: Alt Cat
cats.description: This cat divides itself into four different versions from alternate universes, then collapses back into one. Unlocked by observing a 'paradox' outcome.
cats.strength: Can be in multiple places at once, maximizing petting opportunities.
cats.weakness: Sometimes brings back fleas from a dimension where they are giant.

cats.name: Dudu Cat
cats.description: A cat born of shadow. Its presence is mysterious and calming.
cats.strength: Can manipulate shadows and has never lost a staring contest.
cats.weakness: Causes minor, localized reality distortions when bored.

cats.name: Zombie Cat
cats.description: A cat that has defied the bounds of life and death, lurching back into a state of quantum undeath. What has science done?
cats.strength: Immune to catnip. Has a surprisingly strong grip.
cats.weakness: Tends to fall apart. Literally.

cats.name: Duke Cat
cats.description: A fluffy Siamese cat that seems to carry a perpetual winter with it. Its fur is as white as snow, with points as dark as a winter night.
cats.strength: Can make any room feel cooler on a hot day. Excellent at making snow angels.
cats.weakness: Tends to leave a light dusting of frost on dark furniture.

cats.name: VooDoo Cat
cats.description: A patchwork cat held together by stitches and strange magic. It seems to twitch with an energy that is not entirely its own.
cats.strength: Resistant to being poked. Already has a pin in it.
cats.weakness: May unravel if it gets caught on a snag.

cats.name: Sleepy Cat
cats.description: This cat is in a constant state of quantum slumber, occasionally peeking at reality before drifting off again.
cats.strength: Can fall asleep anywhere, at any time. Unfazed by loud noises.
cats.weakness: Often misses meal times. Has to be carried to the litter box.

cats.name: Glitch Cat
cats.description: A flickering, translucent cat made of pure light. It phases in and out of reality, leaving behind trails of colorful data.
cats.strength: Can pass through solid objects, but only if it feels like it.
cats.weakness: Vulnerable to power outages.

cats.name: Newton Cat
cats.description: This cat has a tenuous relationship with the laws of physics, often finding itself floating upside down.
cats.tagline: What goes up, doesn't always come down.
cats.strength: Excellent at cleaning cobwebs from the ceiling.
cats.weakness: Constantly bumping its head. Struggles with gravity-based puzzles.

cats.name: Paradox Cat
cats.description: This cat seems to be two places at once, glitching between realities.
cats.strength: Exists in multiple states at once, making it impossible to catch.
cats.weakness: Sometimes forgets which reality it's in.

cats.name: Holo Cat
cats.description: A cat made of unstable code and corrupted data. It flickers with a digital energy that seems to warp the space around it.
cats.strength: Can literally 'debug' itself from any tricky situation.
cats.weakness: Prone to crashing. Do not ask it to divide by zero.

cats.name: Vampy Cat
cats.description: A dramatic vampire cat that dissolves into a flock of loyal bats the moment the box creaks open. Unlocked by observing a 'dead' outcome.
cats.strength: Commands an entire swarm of batty sidekicks for recon duty.
cats.weakness: Sunrise, garlic, and inconvenient mirror selfies.

cats.name: Wonder Cat
cats.description: A cape-swirling hero who flickers in and out of phase, chasing impossible probabilities. Unlocked by observing an 'alive' outcome.
cats.strength: Levitates with effortless flair and boosts morale instantly.
cats.weakness: Can't resist pausing for a heroic pose before saving the day.

cats.name: Domino Cat
cats.description: A monochrome tuxedo cat who slips between light and shadow as if they were stage curtains. Wherever elegance is needed, Domino arrives unruffled.
cats.strength: Never loses composure and can blend into any candlelit corridor.
cats.weakness: Collects lint and admiration in equal measure.

cats.name: Sneeky Cat
cats.description: A curtain-level spy who lives for the thrill of peeking out, vanishing, and peeking again. Observation only emboldens its curiosity.
cats.strength: Unmatched reconnaissance skills from behind couches and just-cracked doors.
cats.weakness: Bolts the instant you make eye contact, leaving questions unanswered.

cats.name: Snowball Cat
cats.description: A plush winter sprite that breathes in gentle puffs of frost. It brings calm to the box—unless you own dark furniture.
cats.strength: Radiates soothing winter vibes and keeps the ambient mood delightfully crisp.
cats.weakness: Leaves powdery paw prints on every dark surface.

cats.name: Mummy Cat
cats.description: A regal, bandaged guardian resurrected from ancient probabilities. Gold glints from every wrap as it patrols millennia of mysteries.
cats.strength: Curses dust bunnies out of existence and naps for entire epochs.
cats.weakness: Cannot resist elaborate wrapping paper and the rustle of offering bowls.

cats.name: Cursed Cat
cats.description: A hex-laden prowler whose fur crackles with ancient spite. Every blink rewrites an unlucky timeline.
cats.strength: Turns bad luck into nine extra lives on command.
cats.weakness: Every satisfied purr triggers another minor omen.

cats.name: Frank Cat
cats.description: A stitched-together marvel pulsing with borrowed lightning. Curiosity keeps its bolts tightened.
cats.strength: Reassembles shredded toys with a single electric tail flick.
cats.weakness: Needs nightly recharge beneath a thundercloud-window.

cats.name: Pharaoh Cat
cats.description: Golden-eyed and decree-ready, this sovereign feline returns to audit modern offerings.
cats.strength: Commands litter boxes like sacred tomb chambers.
cats.weakness: Demands tributes of the freshest tuna every hour.

cats.name: Plague Cat
cats.description: Mask on, lantern lit, it prowls through probability fields keeping contagions contained.
cats.strength: Sniffs out quantum anomalies before they spread.
cats.weakness: Mask fogs dramatically whenever curiosity spikes.

cats.name: Reaper Cat
cats.description: Cloaked in twilight, it ferries lost lasers and wayward strings to the great beyond.
cats.strength: Never misses the last nap of the day in any dimension.
cats.weakness: Bone tail rattles loudly whenever treats are near.

cats.name: Scarecrow Cat
cats.description: Stuffed with starlight straw, it guards the quantum cornfields from curious crows.
cats.strength: Keeps dimensional crows far from the catnip patch.
cats.weakness: Straw stuffing leaks whenever it stretches too far.

cats.name: Sharky Cat
cats.description: Part feline, part apex predator, all attitude. It breaches from quantum waters with a grin full of curiosity and teeth.
cats.strength: Slices through bathwater without a ripple and commands respect from rubber ducks.
cats.weakness: Requires a drip tray after every dramatic entrance.

cats.name: Anomaly Cat
cats.description: A reality-hopping spectacle that cycles through multiple forms before you can finish blinking. It's the glitch in everybody's matrix.
cats.strength: Explores parallel timelines faster than you can document them.
cats.weakness: Refuses to hold a shape for family photos.

cats.name: Cloud Cat
cats.description: A serene cat that exhales into vapor, drifts skyward, and rains back down as purrs. Solid one moment, cirrus the next.
cats.strength: Floats through walls to chase the faintest sunbeams.
cats.weakness: Loses its outline in humid conversation and foggy mirrors.

cats.name: Cosmic Cat
cats.description: A constellation in motion, sprinkled with stardust and orbital whimsy. Its whiskers point toward the nearest anomaly.
cats.strength: Maps new constellations with a single whisker twitch.
cats.weakness: Occasionally forgets that gravity should still apply indoors.

cats.name: Mystic Cat
cats.description: A pastel oracle wrapped in shimmering sigils. Every stare feels like fortune-telling, every tail flick a prophecy.
cats.strength: Reads futures in dust motes and tea leaves without spilling a drop.
cats.weakness: Prophecies dissolve if anyone mentions snacks mid-vision.

cats.name: Pixel Cat
cats.description: A retro-rendered feline with crunchy edges and big paradox energy. It pounces between frames with perfect timing.
cats.strength: Debugs corrupted timelines at 8-bit speed.
cats.weakness: Crashes if asked to render 4K emotions.
